original_theorem:
If $f^{(n)}(x_0)$ exists$,$ then
\begin{equation}\label{eq:2.5.7}
f(x)=\sum_{r=0}^n\frac{f^{(r)}(x_0)}{ r!} (x-x_0)^r+E_n(x)(x-x_0)^n,
\end{equation}
where
$$
\lim_{x\to x_0} E_n(x)=E_n(x_0)=0.
$$

```lean4
    (hf : ContDiffAt ‚Ñù n f x‚ÇÄ) :
    ‚àÉ E : ‚Ñù ‚Üí ‚Ñù,
      (‚àÄ x, f x = (‚àë r in Finset.range (n + 1),
          (iteratedDeriv r f x‚ÇÄ / (r ! : ‚Ñù)) * (x - x‚ÇÄ) ^ r) + E x * (x - x‚ÇÄ) ^ n) ‚àß
      E x‚ÇÄ = 0 ‚àß
      Tendsto E (ùìù x‚ÇÄ) (ùìù 0) := by
```

import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0
open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat Filter
theorem taylor_expansion_with_peano_remainder
    (n : ‚Ñï) {f : ‚Ñù ‚Üí ‚Ñù} {x‚ÇÄ : ‚Ñù}
    (hf : ContDiffAt ‚Ñù n f x‚ÇÄ) :
    ‚àÉ E : ‚Ñù ‚Üí ‚Ñù,
      (‚àÄ x, f x = (‚àë r in Finset.range (n + 1),
          (iteratedDeriv r f x‚ÇÄ / (r ! : ‚Ñù)) * (x - x‚ÇÄ) ^ r) + E x * (x - x‚ÇÄ) ^ n) ‚àß
      E x‚ÇÄ = 0 ‚àß
      Tendsto E (ùìù x‚ÇÄ) (ùìù 0) := by sorry

proof_steps.natural_language:
We assume:
‚Ä¢ The n-th derivative of $f$ at $x_0$, $f^{(n)}(x_0)$, exists [tc_1].
‚Ä¢ $T_n(x) = \sum_{r=0}^n\frac{f^{(r)}(x_0)}{ r!} (x-x_0)^r$ is the n-th Taylor polynomial of $f$ at $x_0$ [def_1].
Therefore, we conclude:
‚Ä¢ (Implicit premise from (2.5.5)) The limit of the scaled difference between the function and its Taylor polynomial is zero: $\lim_{x\to x_0} \frac{f(x) - T_n(x)}{(x-x_0)^n} = 0$ [l1].
proof_steps.lean_tactics:
have h_is_o : (fun x => f x - (‚àë r in Finset.range (n + 1), (iteratedDeriv r f x‚ÇÄ / (r ! : ‚Ñù)) * (x - x‚ÇÄ) ^ r))
    =o[ùìù x‚ÇÄ] (fun x => (x - x‚ÇÄ) ^ n) := by
    convert hf.is_o_sub_taylor_series_at_end
    ext x
    simp only [sub_eq_sub_iff_left, FormalMultilinearSeries.sumUpTo_apply]
    apply Finset.sum_congr rfl
    intro r hr
    have hcr : ContDiffAt ‚Ñù r f x‚ÇÄ := hf.of_le (Nat.le_of_lt (Finset.mem_range.mp hr))
    rw [taylorSeries_apply, smul_apply, smul_eq_mul, div_eq_mul_inv, mul_comm]
    apply (mul_right_inj' (inv_ne_zero (Nat.cast_ne_zero.mpr (Nat.factorial_ne_zero r)))).mpr
    rw [mul_comm]
    rw [iteratedDeriv_eq_iteratedFDeriv_apply_one hcr, iteratedFDeriv_def]
    conv_rhs => rw [‚Üê (iteratedFDerivWithin ‚Ñù r f Set.univ x‚ÇÄ).map_const (x - x‚ÇÄ)]
    simp [smul_eq_mul]
